hotels.title: Boutique Hamilton Island Beachfront Escape with Exclusive Outdoor Pool & Signature Island Dining
hotels.description: Discover a sun-soaked haven nestled among the swaying palms of Catseye Beach with a stay at this luxurious Hamilton Island oasis, overlooking the cerulean waters of the Coral Sea. Here, the Sunday spirit lingers in the air, and rooms boast soothing, warm interiors with spacious terraces or balconies that serve up gorgeous tropical vistas. Spend your days lounging by the sparkling outdoor pool, indulge in family-friendly fun with an array of non-motorised water sports, or head to the island's Spa wumurdaylin for some pampering. Culinary highlights await at Catseye Pool Club, where celebrated chefs Josh and Julie Niland showcase Australia's freshest seasonal produce and seafood in an elevated yet relaxed setting. Whether you're here to unwind or explore, this is island living at its finest - slow, sunny and unforgettable.

hotels.title: Adults-Only Hamilton Island Oasis with Direct Access to Catseye Beach
hotels.description: Stay on the tranquil edge of Hamilton Island's famous Catseye Beach at the boutique Beach Club, an adults-only oasis boasting a spectacular beachfront location. Spend sunny days swimming in the infinity swimming pool that overlooks the ocean, unwind in a swinging hammock on the beach, order a tropical cocktail in the lounge while you watch the sunset, and dine on modern Australian fare at the Beach Club restaurant.

hotels.title: Hamilton Island Self-Contained Bungalow Escape
hotels.description: Experience one of Australiaâ€™s most spectacular and sought-after destinations with a stay at the self-contained Palm Bungalows on stunning Hamilton Island - the gateway to the Great Barrier Reef. The idyllic, freestanding Palm Bungalows are dotted throughout landscaped gardens and perfect for couples or small families looking for a tropical home away from home. Best of all, kids stay and eat free. Each breezy bungalow has modern interiors, a king bed, large ensuite bathroom and a private balcony where you can enjoy the warm ocean breeze. Better yet, the bungalows have a small kitchenette, allowing you to self-cater. Minutes from your doorstep, you can lounge on the shores of pristine beaches or take the short hike to the highest point on the island, Passage Peak, for breathtaking views.

hotels.title: Iconic Hamilton Island Family Escape near Catseye Beach
hotels.description: Overlooking Catseye Beach's hypnotic turquoise waters, Reef View Hotel Hamilton Island offers an iconic Whitsundays experience. For those looking to relax and unwind, there's Spa wumurdaylin (additional costs apply), a sauna and several pools to choose from: the Reef View Hotel Pool, Bougainvillea Pool and the 35m lagoon-style Main Pool with a swim-up bar. For family-friendly fun, there's the beach, non-motorised watersport equipment, access to the nearby Passage Peak Scenic Trail and Clownfish Club, a kids' haven (12 years and under). Best of all, kids stay and eat free.
